---
id: list-paylinks
title: "List Paylinks"
description: "The **List Paylinks** endpoint allows you to retrieve a comprehensive list of all pay links created within your organization on the BoomFi platform. Use this endpoint to efficiently manage and review all the payment links you have generated, ensuring they align with your business needs."

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"List Paylinks"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v1/paylinks"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



The **List Paylinks** endpoint allows you to retrieve a comprehensive list of all pay links created within your organization on the BoomFi platform. Use this endpoint to efficiently manage and review all the payment links you have generated, ensuring they align with your business needs.

> ðŸ“˜ Note
> 
> Paylinks are created automatically when a plan is created. Each plan has a corresponding paylink that can be used to facilitate payments.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"after","in":"query","description":"Return paylinks after this cursor for pagination.","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"before","in":"query","description":"Return paylinks before this cursor for pagination.","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"limit","in":"query","description":"The maximum number of paylinks to return per page (1-100).","schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":1,"maximum":100}},{"name":"page","in":"query","description":"The page number of the results to return.","schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":1}},{"name":"since","in":"query","description":"Return paylinks created or updated since this timestamp.","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"sort","in":"query","description":"Sort order for the results.","schema":{"type":"string","enum":["asc","desc"]}},{"name":"until","in":"query","description":"Return paylinks created or updated until this timestamp.","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
